definitions: denoting energy emitted in the form of rays or waves

examples.text: if electric heaters are left too close to furniture the radiated heat can start a fire
dosimeters track exposure to radiated energy

shortDefinitions: denoting energy emitted in form of rays or waves

definitions: used in the names of animals with markings arranged like rays

examples.text: radiated tortoises are classified as critically endangered

shortDefinitions: used in names of animals with markings arranged like rays
